input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I am hungry.
output: Ягъни болгъ.
expected: Men och qoldim.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: She is my sister.
output: Ummo yo'nalam.
expected: U mening singlim.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The weather is cold today.
output: Янги боришон hoy.
expected: Bugun havo sovuq.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: This is my house.
output: Bu this aylagim.
expected: Bu mening uyim.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: We are friends.
output: We are friends.
expected: Biz do‘stmiz.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I want some water.
output: Sana mudaffa qilmoqda.
expected: Menga biroz suv kerak.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: He is very tall.
output: Uyurgan ko'chib o'tgan.
expected: U juda baland bo‘yli.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Where is the bus stop?
output: Навуқтан автобус тоҷик?
expected: Avtobus bekati qayerda?

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I like your car.
output: Sizin ichingiz kelib qiladigan ichingizdir.
expected: Menga mashinangiz yoqdi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: My name is Ali.
output: Meningiz Ali.
expected: Mening ismim Ali.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I go to the gym three times a week.
output: Iyogiyaga oʻtadan ham shunday edim.
expected: Men haftasiga uch marta sport zaliga boraman.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Yesterday we went shopping at the mall.
output: Yesterday, u we khoda shodaktar dar mall.
expected: Kecha biz savdo markaziga borib xarid qildik.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: He speaks Uzbek, Russian, and English fluently.
output: Uzbek, Russian, va English sifatida har xizmat qilib so'zlaydi.
expected: U o‘zbek, rus va ingliz tillarida ravon gapiradi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I forgot my wallet at home this morning.
output: “Bu gün sabah atışığım paragarmı evde unutdum.”
expected: Ertalab hamyonimni uyda unutib qoldim.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: My father works in a bank as a manager.
output: Sagʻliq buyrugʻi bilan bir xodim rahbarligida ishlayotgan farzandim.
expected: Otam bankda menejer bo‘lib ishlaydi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: We are planning to visit Samarkand next month.
output: ما ما بین‌المللی ما بین‌المللی در ماه آینده به سامارکند سفر می‌کنیم.
expected: Keyingi oy Samarqandga borishni rejalashtiryapmiz.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The train leaves at 8:30 in the morning.
output: 30 урдинча чакта бағындырады.
expected: Poyezd ertalab soat 8:30 da jo‘naydi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Please call me when you arrive.
output: Please call me when you arrive.
expected: Yetib borganingizda iltimos, menga qo‘ng‘iroq qiling.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I don’t eat meat, but I like fish.
output: Я мясо не кушаю, но мне рыбу нравится.
expected: Men go‘sht yemayman, lekin baliqni yaxshi ko‘raman.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: There is a big park near my house.
output: Ya hozirga yo'nalish bo'lib, uch quyi parkti bor.
expected: Uyim yonida katta bog‘ bor.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Education is the most powerful tool to change the world.
output: Образование наи могущественный инструмент для изменения мира.
expected: Ta’lim — dunyoni o‘zgartirishning eng kuchli vositasidir.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: No matter how difficult the road is, we must keep moving forward.
output: Yuqori darajada qahramoniyat bilan hujjat qilinadi.
expected: Yo‘l qanchalik qiyin bo‘lmasin, biz oldinga yurishda davom etishimiz kerak.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: He achieved success thanks to his patience and hard work.
output: Ushbu xizmatga erishgan uchun hechta muddatli barmoq va hard qo'llib chiqishga to'g'ri.
expected: U sabr-toqat va mehnati tufayli muvaffaqiyatga erishdi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Freedom of speech is an important right in every society.
output: Before you proceed with the translation, I would appreciate it if you could provide a specific text or question for translation, so that I can give you the most accurate and helpful response. If you have a particular text in mind, please share it, and I will translate it for you from English to Uzbek.
expected: So‘z erkinligi har bir jamiyatda muhim huquqdir.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The book discusses the impact of technology on human relationships.
output: Kitob technologiyaning qo'lqiyni tarkibida insoniyatning bog'lanishlarini o'rganayotgan.
expected: Kitob texnologiyaning inson munosabatlariga ta’sirini muhokama qiladi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: People should take responsibility for protecting the environment.
output: Амироқони коррупцияларрона дурбатиламо, оғозиҳо дар умуман коррупцияро замонандан чор шудаандо, онҳо дар сархунати коррупцияндо амал кардаандо. Амироқони хидматдоронистони коррупцияни дар онро баҳрамандандо.
expected: Odamlar atrof-muhitni asrash uchun mas’uliyatni o‘z zimmasiga olishi kerak.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: True friendship is based on trust and honesty.
output: Yashiroyo bilan birlashish qandayligini bilishlama, mutlaqotaraf va xushxoʻrlikga asoslanadi.
expected: Haqiqiy do‘stlik ishonch va halollikka asoslanadi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Our history is full of lessons for future generations.
output: Our history is full of lessons for future generations.
expected: Tariximiz kelajak avlodlar uchun saboqlarga boy.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: In difficult times, unity is the key to overcoming challenges.
output: Тугриклик кибдаддат, яктогирлик дилимдинча хилик келгендир.
expected: Qiyin paytlarda birlik sinovlarni yengishning kalitidir.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Success without ethics is an empty achievement.
output: Екичкалар экичкалар эмрасига мумин адаб болгон баъзакча эмрас болуп келбейт.
expected: Axloqsiz muvaffaqiyat — bo‘sh yutuqdir.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The new processor architecture increases performance by reducing power consumption.
output: نامبرورکردار ساختاری جدید عملکرد را با کاهش مصرف انرژی بهبود می‌بخشد.
expected: Yangi protsessor arxitekturasi quvvat sarfini kamaytirib, unumdorlikni oshiradi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The laboratory uses high-precision instruments to conduct experiments.
output: Лаборатория использует высоко-precision инструменты для проведения экспериментов.
expected: Laboratoriya tajribalarni o‘tkazish uchun yuqori aniqlikdagi asboblardan foydalanadi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Renewable energy sources can significantly reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
output:
Renewable energy sources can significantly reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

Тоқлик текст: Жил қорқиш мекенiyatҳои таъсисан ёзгартмашгарон гумиргарон гази кӯҳиширо аз рӯи зидди асосиҳи тоҷик мекенiyatҳои таъсисан ёзгартмашгарон мебошанд.
expected: Qayta tiklanuvchi energiya manbalari issiqxona gazlari chiqindilarini sezilarli kamaytirishi mumkin.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The robot is programmed to perform repetitive tasks without human intervention.
output: Робот программирован для выполнения повторяющихся задач без участия человека.
expected: Robot inson aralashuvisiz takrorlanuvchi vazifalarni bajarishga dasturlangan.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The software automatically backs up data to prevent loss.
output: Software ozi so'ratgan mahsulot data natqor bo'lib qoldirib turadi, natqorotlar natqorlanadi.
expected: Dastur ma’lumotlarning yo‘qolishini oldini olish uchun avtomatik zaxiralashni amalga oshiradi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The research team analyzed the impact of climate change on crop yields.
output: Тунисий дилерликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликликлик
expected: Tadqiqot guruhi iqlim o‘zgarishining hosildorlikka ta’sirini tahlil qildi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The device uses wireless communication to transmit sensor readings.
output: Эскичи эшитекчилики системанда жактан элчки кулардаги сензорларды тижетише алу укушлары бирок мекениятелери болуп эмесdir.
expected: Qurilma sensor o‘qishlarini uzatish uchun simsiz aloqa texnologiyasidan foydalanadi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The experiment confirmed the accuracy of the theoretical model.
output: حالتی نظری مدل دقیقیت آن ت Confirmed.
expected: Tajriba nazariy modelning aniqligini tasdiqladi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The satellite continuously monitors weather patterns across the globe.
output: Заманчиги саттелит кокойлу эрозия тилалар бағытында донъяда роқия берди.
expected: Sun’iy yo‘ldosh butun dunyo bo‘ylab ob-havo holatini uzluksiz kuzatib boradi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The engineers developed a new algorithm to detect network intrusions.
output: Инженирlar qo'shiq ishlab chiqarish bo'yicha bir nechta yuqori darajali algoritmga ishon.
expected: Muhandislar tarmoqdagi ruxsatsiz kirishlarni aniqlash uchun yangi algoritm ishlab chiqdi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Bro, last nigh we partied hard till 4 a.m.
output: Bro, last night we partying hard till 4 a.m.
expected: Jigar, kecha soat 4gacha dam oldik

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: My phone’s dead, can I borrow yours?
output: Mi telefon imkoniyatdan ozgarchi bo'lib, ularingizga o'rnatmoqmizmi?
expected: Meni telefonim o’chib qoldi, senikini olib tursam bo’ladimi?

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Man, he talks big but never does anything.
output: Man, ulya bo'lib, ammoqda bo'lib, ammoq bo'lamo.
expected: U faqat gapirishi bilar ekan, qo’lidan hech narsa kelmas ekan.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Let’s grab some burgers after work.
output: "Yaxsho, sozlamo bir burgerlar so'rab."
expected: Ishdan kegin burger yemimizami.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: Dude, your car is sick!
output: Sizning avtomatizm sardor!
expected: Jigar, moshinen zo’r ku!

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I’m broke, can you cover me this time?
output: Yanada bor bo'ladim, unda to'g'ri bo'ladim?
expected: Bir tingim yo’q, bus afar sen tolab yubora olasanmi?

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: She ghosted me after the second date.
output: Она ghosted (фр. от ghost - "дьявольский дух" - "дух смерти", "пленник смерти", "духа смерти) меня после второго свидания.
expected: Ikkinchi uchrashuvdan kegin, u meni bortimni berdi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: That deal is shady, I wouldn’t trust it.
output: Янги тақдим, бекъа бастағым.
expected: Bu yerda bir gap bor, men ishonmas edim.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: I’m starving, let’s hit the café.
output: Ben so'nga qarim, o'ngi cafesiga o'tkazing.
expected: Qornim rossa och, kafega kirsakchi.

input: Translate the following text from en to uz and provide only the translated text: The guy’s loaded, money isn’t an issue for him.
output: Эмалтан келеме, мамоннан келmaydi.
expected: Bu bolani soqqasi ko’p, puldan muammo yo’q.
